properties.name: camel.dataformat.grok.allow-multiple-matches-per-line
properties.description: If false, every line of input is matched for pattern only once. Otherwise the line can be scanned multiple times when non-terminal pattern is used.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.grok.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the grok data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.grok.flattened
properties.description: Turns on flattened mode. In flattened mode the exception is thrown when there are multiple pattern matches with same key.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.grok.named-only
properties.description: Whether to capture named expressions only or not (i.e. %{IP:ip} but not ${IP})

properties.name: camel.dataformat.grok.pattern
properties.description: The grok pattern to match lines of input
